body: What i hate it's not bout ntr what i hate  is if it's not fckin english
@Gambio Exactly! I don't know why people don't get it, a lot get mad and just hate NTR, I mean if you don't like it that's all good but fuck off

@usamiharu I'll have to disagree, the best part of NTR is seeing the process of a woman breaking down to her basic instincts and throwing away her morals to enjoy the pleasure, which sets up every subsequent aspect such as corruption and betrayal that NTR is known for. If you don't get to see that process then the whole experience just loses its impact. That's where Carn comes up short. In almost all of their works it's just 0 to 100. You're here and then you're there and it happens way too fast. The upside is that we get more panels with "content" wink wink.
Part  2 https://nhentai.net/g/272759/ This needs at least one more chapter to develop the story fully but ı guess this is the end
Rocket Monkey is an incel cuck,i hate that author🤦‍♂️

@oops Forgetting that Carn before transitioning to full NTR made Vanilla as far i can remember sooo if you want a Carn vanilla work just literally revisit his old works and expecting a new vanilla to Carn again might take a long time.
@usamiharu, I mean yeah but I kinda want a change for once. I mean even rocket monkey does vanilla from time to time (primal=200pg of  vanilla)

@Gambino Though that's not how NTR is NTR is corruption not "female losing control of her lust" its basically destroying someone else life and Carn delivers it pretty good when you are talking about "female losing control of her lust" you talking about Netori or something and plus this one if im right is new and not a series and most of the time one-shot doujinshi tends to be rushed if you want a proper NTR of Carn go read the longer series.

See the thing about Carn is that he/she forgets the most crucial element of NTR and that's the female losing control of her lust, getting seduced to the "dark side". Some of the best NTRtists focus on that element and it's sexy as hell seeing a girl spiral into sexual hell. Carn just throws women into situations and it just happens like here you just get a couple panels showing her guilt than bam next scene she's immediately sucking dick.

Great art but bad execution.

body: Don't know if carn just loves NTR (and if so, he's sick) of if experienced it first-hand; thus getting some serious traumas. Either way, the sickest NTR hentai you'll see animated will be carn's
Truthful a third of all girls I known are exactly same as Carn's ntr works. Able cuck one only half year, luck out with less then five with friends and gang team. Carn still sick as fuck
The sequel is a lot better (imo) since it doesn’t spend 1/4 of its pages trying to illicit the *feeling* of NTR. It’s just implied and thus 1000x more tolerable.
what else can you expect from carn? this author have some traumas
